net.spacive.apps.ejazdybackend.database

Class DynamoDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.spacive.apps.ejazdybackend.database.DynamoDao

  • @Repository
public class DynamoDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is an implementation of database access object for AWS service - DynamoDB.

    This class manipulates mainly with Lesson.

    See Also:
    Lesson

      • createLesson

        public boolean createLesson(Lesson lesson)
        Create new lesson.

        instructorId and startTime have to be present in lesson object passed as param.

        Parameters:
        lesson - lesson which should be created.
        Returns:
        true if lesson was created.

      • deleteLesson

        public void deleteLesson(Lesson lesson)

        Parameters:

      • updateLesson

        public void updateLesson(Lesson lesson,
                         boolean ignoreNullAttrs)
        Update lesson

        if ignoreNullAttrs is true, corresponding null params in lesson will be unchanged.

        Parameters:
        lesson - lesson which should be updated.
        ignoreNullAttrs - ignore null attributes.
